Class GameCombine

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameCombine

  • public class GameCombine
extends java.lang.Object
    Class GameCombine

    The GameCombin class is the class that brings all the components of the game together. It contains Game and SecondaryPanel. It provides functionality for checking if the correct capital is selected, update the game components and paint the correct elements on screen.

    Instance Variables: sp: SecondaryPanel instance

    game: Game instance

    isRunning: whether or not the game is current running (paused or not)

    dangerZone: Hero's base image

    textBg: text background image

    pauseBg: screen image when game is paused

    hasWon: final winner screen image

    Author:
    Utkarsh Lamba

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameCombine

        public GameCombine(java.lang.String countryPath,
                   java.lang.String capitalPath,
                   java.lang.String countryHeader,
                   java.lang.String capitalHeader,
                   int enemySpeed)
        Constructor

        The constructor loads all the images, instantiates game and sp, ensure all the keys are released initially, sets the gameStartTime, puts the game is running mode and updates the capital options.

        Parameters:
        countryPath - path to file containing countries list
        capitalPath - path to file containing capitals list
        countryHeader - country file header
        capitalHeader - capital file header
        enemySpeed - speed of the enemies

    • Method Detail

        This method checks if the correct capital is selected by the player

      • paint
